abstrac: Creating effective solutions for today's business owner.
bio:
Pam Barker has developed small businesses for over 20 years. Proactive, analytical, resourceful professional who understands finance, operations and marketing. Extensive work with start-up organizations and small businesses up to 15ML in annual sales, both virtual and brick-n-mortar. 

Business owner of Cr8tivsolutions LLC since 1999, working virtually since 2003. Cr8tivsolutions will provide cost effective service to meet your business office needs with the successful track record of an experienced business management consultant.  


Pam Barker
Cr8tivsolutions LLC
www.cr8tivsolutions.com
